DESCRIPTION: Earn gold at the end of combat if this card is not exhausted.
Special Power that imposes a restriction in exchange for an advantage.
When your energy is insufficient, can be partially paid with gold at a rate of #b10 gold per missing Energy.
When you add this card to your deck, add a Doubloon to your deck.
Your next attack this turn deals #b10% additional damage per level of Fervor.
Gain an additional #b50% Piety while Enlightened.
At the end of your turn, defeat ANY enemies with HP equal or lower than your #bPiety and lose a third of your #bPiety.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
